text:
Hi,
We are trying to locate any standards/best practices for cleaning fitness center/exercise facilities and equipment, with an emphasis on how often they should be cleaned and what products are best to use. In addition, we'd also like any recommendations specific to MRSA prevention.
Any guidance you can provide would be appreciated.
